name: Convince Sherlock Holmes To Let You Use The Good Controller
name_original: Convince Sherlock Holmes To Let You Use The Good Controller
description:
It's time for a night of gaming with your friend, Sherlock Holmes. But when he hands you the worst controller you've ever seen, it seems like it's gonna be a long night. Maybe you can convince him to let you use the good one?

Special thanks to my good friend Russel Tussel for beta testing and the idea for this game.
